title: Designing Customized Online Science Education Programs for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Experimental Methodologies
context.additional_context: An environment requiring smartphone-based access, emphasizing real-time interaction and self-directed learning design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world scientific field problems and propose solutions through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can apply learning content by utilizing peer feedback and instructor coaching in a Case-Based Learning environment.
Learners can establish and execute personalized learning plans in online learning environments using self-regulated learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
